1951  npm init -y
 1952  npm install --save-dev hardhat        
 1953  npx hardhat
 1954  npm install --save-dev @openzeppelin/hardhat-upgrades
 1955  npm install @openzeppelin/contracts   
 1956  npm install @openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable
 1957  cd hhts
 1958  npx hardhat clean
 1959  npx hardhat compile
 1960  clear
 1961  npx hardhat test

 npx hardhat coverage -stugum a ardyoq testerov inch tokosnes cackel
